What are we looking for?
Strong hand-on experience in NodeJS TechnologiesSolid hand-on experience with ReactJSKnowledge of Object-Oriented Programming and SQLExperience with AngularJS, .DotNet, Java and/or React Native is a plusAbility to manage a hosting environment, including database administration as well as scaling applications to handle load changesExperienced in developing on Unix/Linux environmentsEffective communication skills & customer-oriented mindsetAbility to work with a multiple team and stakeholdersEnjoy constant learning and working with new technologiesExcellent critical thinking and problem solving skillsExperience in public sector projects is a plus
Benefits
What do we offer?
Fun working environment Employee Wellness Program

Job description:
Job Description & Responsibilities
The candidate will be attached to the Digital Health Solutions department. He/she will lead the technical software development. In this position, the candidate will gain exposure to the product development life cycle of software as medical device (SaMD), and breadth of medical device projects based on various technologies and disease states.
The job activities include but not limited to the list below:
 Align and work together with Project Manager and Solution architect for the Software development. Plan and provide inputs to the overall project plan and deliverables. Responsible for the software development and technical validation. Build responsive performant web frontends for cross-platform browsers. Build highly scalable backends using modern server side frameworks. Design and develop robust APIs, web services, and databases. Envision the software requirements to create solutions from scratch. Collaboratively take part in all aspects of software delivery.
Job Requirements
 Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology / Computer Science / Engineering or equivalent.
Work Experience
 Minimum 3 years of experience in full stack software development.
Technical Skills
 Experience in building client-side applications using React, Angular, Flutter, Firebase, etc. Experience in building server-side applications using Node.js, Express, Python, .NET, etc. Experience in working with SQL and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, Redis, Firestore, MySQL. Experience in designing and developing REST APIs and working with OAuth and OpenID Connect. Experience in working with cloud providers such as AWS, GCP, Azure, and serverless services. Experience in working with FHIR, EHR systems, medical software, or digital health apps is a plus.
Soft Skills
 Strong communication and collaborative skills to work closely with varied teams and partners.
Abilities/Aptitudes
 Highly motivated and results driven. Proactive and takes ownership of the projects. Adaptable to work exigencies. Works well as part of a team, yet able to work independently. Prioritises assigned tasks and manages time accordingly. Self-learner.
The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Job Title: Senior Full-stack Developer (Infra/DevOps Engineer) - 1 Year Contract - Renewable
Job description:
Senior Full-Stack Developer (Infra/DevOps Engineer) - 1-Year Contract – Renewable
Sgcarmart is looking for a Senior Full-Stack Developer with a bachelor's in Computer Science or Information Technology. Candidates should have at least 5 years of experience in web/PHP development and 2 years of experience in Infra/DevOps engineering related.
Responsibilities
 Responsible for part of the architecture design, system design, development, maintenance and optimisation of the company's websites Participate in the application management background of the development platform, including data architecture, interface customisation, data collection and analysis Setup, deploy, and maintain scalable, high availability systems Setup and maintain CI/CD, automated testing, development, and delivery environments Write scripts/programmes for service monitoring and health check of systems
Technical Requirements
 Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or related discipline Minimum 5 years of web/PHP development experience Minimum 2 years Infra/DevOps engineering related experience Web front-end development experience, familiar with HTML (DIV+CSS) Proficient in PHP, MySQL, Linux development and service environment Proficient in using mainstream framework and template engine (e.g. Laravel, CodeIgniter), understanding microservices design patterns Experience in building CI/CD pipeline, managing GIT repo and collaborating with developers Good understanding of hardware infrastructure systems (network switches, firewalls, routers, etc) and Linux operating system Knowledge in overall networking - DNS, DHCP, TCP/IP, Routing, Firewalls, Windows Active directory is preferred Cloud and DevOps certifications such as Azure/AWS Solution Architect, DevOps, etc preferred Technology readiness – propensity to accept and learn new technologies Good team player, well-organised, meticulous
SALARY
 Employment will be on a 1-Year contractual basis (Renewable) Depending on your qualification, you can expect a monthly salary in the range of $4,000 to $6,000 Variable Bonus upon completion of contract
Other Information
 Employee benefits: 14 Days Annual Leave, 14 Days Medical Leave, Medical Claims
Submit your resume and expected salary via the ‘Apply’ button or email to careers@sgcarmart.com

You will be working within a highly motivated agile development team to deliver high-quality software applications according to requirements.
Web application front-endsWeb application/API back-endsAutomation scripts

Job description:
Job Description & Responsibilities
The candidate will be attached to the Digital Health Solutions department. He/she will lead the technical software development. In this position, the candidate will gain exposure to the product development life cycle of software as medical device (SaMD), and breadth of medical device projects based on various technologies and disease states.
The job activities include but not limited to the list below:
 Align and work together with Project Manager and Solution architect for the Software development. Plan and provide inputs to the overall project plan and deliverables. Responsible for the software development and technical validation. Build responsive performant web frontends for cross-platform browsers. Build highly scalable backends using modern server side frameworks. Design and develop robust APIs, web services, and databases. Envision the software requirements to create solutions from scratch. Collaboratively take part in all aspects of software delivery.
Job Requirements
 Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology / Computer Science / Engineering or equivalent.
Work Experience
 Minimum 3 years of experience in full stack software development.
Technical Skills
 Experience in building client-side applications using React, Angular, Flutter, Firebase, etc. Experience in building server-side applications using Node.js, Express, Python, .NET, etc. Experience in working with SQL and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, Redis, Firestore, MySQL. Experience in designing and developing REST APIs and working with OAuth and OpenID Connect. Experience in working with cloud providers such as AWS, GCP, Azure, and serverless services. Experience in working with FHIR, EHR systems, medical software, or digital health apps is a plus.
Soft Skills
 Strong communication and collaborative skills to work closely with varied teams and partners.
Abilities/Aptitudes
 Highly motivated and results driven. Proactive and takes ownership of the projects. Adaptable to work exigencies. Works well as part of a team, yet able to work independently. Prioritises assigned tasks and manages time accordingly. Self-learner.
The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

The Defence Science and Technology Agency (DSTA) brings you to the forefront of cybersecurity, digital transformation and engineering. From working on software development and systems integration to unmanned technologies and artificial intelligence, you can have an impact on Singapore’s defence.
Achieve your fullest potential with opportunities to build your technical expertise and hone your competencies in diverse domains. You can also expect an immersive learning experience, where you will work with bright minds and collaborate with global industry experts.
DSTA is recognised as one of the top 10 employers in the Engineering & IT sector, where our engineers and IT professionals work alongside procurement specialists to deliver state-of-the-art capabilities for Singapore’s peace and security.
Internship opportunities and a meaningful career await you.
Learn more about DSTA at https://www.dsta.gov.sg .
 Opportunity 
Imagine developing the brain, heart and soul of complex systems that serve as the nerve centre to plan and monitor mission executions. If this sounds exciting to you and you are passionate about technology, we welcome you to join us on this journey!
At DSTA’s Command, Control and Communications Development (C3D) Programme Centre, we develop software systems that enable decision makers in the SAF and government agencies to execute missions successfully. We are looking for a Frontend Developer with strong technical competencies and problem-solving skills to join us.
 What can the team offer you? 
Our Team: You will join a multi-disciplinary team of developers, architects and product managers who are passionate about creating meaningful and impactful software systems. It’s a place where you can solve diverse, complex challenges, alongside thoughtful, intelligent individuals who lead with curiosity, empathy, and optimism.
Career Opportunities: We work on different projects, ranging from experimentations to operational system development in different domains spanning across Air, Land, Sea and Whole-of-Government systems. You will also have the flexibility and whitespace to work on exciting side projects and hone your skillsets in different technical areas like artificial intelligence, modelling and simulation, cybersecurity and internet of things (IoT). At times, you will have the chance to share at brown bag sessions and townhalls, as well as collaborate with worldwide leading research institutes and industry commercial partners.
Professional Development: There are numerous opportunities to grow and excel professionally in your career with us. From your first day with us, your onboarding experience includes mentorship, buddy system and technical courses to build your competencies and connect with colleagues on a personal level. On top of that, we work with DSTA’s in-house Academy to curate courses taught by both industry professionals as well as in-house lecturers.
Culture: We encourage our community to bring their whole selves to work, respect the need for work-life balance and allow for autonomy in the software development process and your career.
 Once here you will 
Collaborate closely with product managers, UX designers, developers and other stakeholders to deliver valuable and impactful software that combat evolving threats.Work in a multidisciplinary software development team to define technical requirements and architecture, scope tasks, and develop software applications geared towards usability, scale, robustness and performance.Design and develop user-centric interface and frontend services for one or more web, mobile and thick-client applications.Perform automated build and tests in our DevSecOps pipeline.Adopt continuous delivery practices to improve software delivery performance.Exchange technical knowledge and experiences with like-minded developers.
Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related fields.Candidates with more than 2 years of relevant working experience may be considered for a Senior Software Developer position.
Relevant Experience And Mindset Knowledge of REST API, Role Based Access Control, Web Sockets.Knowledge of web and application technologies:Mobile Application Platform (e.g. iOS, Android SDK etc.)Web Application (JavaScript – e.g. AngularJS, ReactJS, HTML, CSS and other related frameworks)Thick Client System (e.g. Java, C++ etc.)Geographic Information System (e.g. Luciad, ArcGIS)Good understanding of data structures, design patterns, algorithms and software design.Have a passion for software development and technology.Thrive in a team-oriented, project-based work environment.Excellent analytical and communication skills including the ability to deliver technical concepts clearly across different audiences.Have a passion for innovation and learning new software architectures, frameworks, languages and technologies.
 It would be a bonus if you have 
Experience in Agile (e.g. Scrum or Extreme Programming) practices and software development lifecycle.Ability to distill user needs and translate them to technical outcomes and documentation.Knowledge of front-end development build and tools.Knowledge of DevSecOps, CI/CD pipelines and code versioning tools such as Git.Knowledge of secure coding and cybersecurity.
 Application Instructions 
If this sounds like the right environment for you to grow and thrive, then we are looking forward to getting to know you!
To apply, please submit your resume and cover letter.
As DSTA is an agency under Ministry of Defence, only Singapore Citizens will be considered.
Skills: Algorithms:Communication:Data Structures:Software Design:Technical Requirements

Job description:
About Aureus GroupEstablished in September 2013, Aureus Academy is Singapore’s leading music school with over 18,000 students enrolled in our school. Aureus Academy specializes in providing individually tailored piano lessons, violin lessons, drum lessons, voice lessons, and more to students of all ages and abilities.
Aureus has transformed a traditional brick-and-mortar service into a cutting-edge business featured in Forbes, Business Times, Straits Times, and Channel News Asia. Aureus Group, the parent company of Aureus Academy, has been ranked 4th in the “Singapore’s Fastest Growing Companies” survey conducted by The Straits Times and Germany-based global research firm Statista.

Job description:
Position Overview

Autodesk Identity Access and Management team is seeking a skilled and highly motivated individual who loves to find and develop efficient, scalable, and thoughtful solutions to various technical and product challenges. As a team member, you will have the opportunity to work with the team that builds Autodesk’s Identity Access Management Platform. The service is one of the key business enablers serving millions of Autodesk customers daily. It is leveraged by 150+ Autodesk desktop, mobile, web applications and cloud services and a growing third-party developer ecosystem for managing user authentication, and authorization.

Responsibilities
Work as a Software Engineer Intern, member of a self-organized agile team that builds, owns and runs the service as a platform to enable Enterprise Single-Sign-On feature for the enterprise customers of Autodesk. Develop, own, and maintain the cloud service. Assist in the operation of the service, e.g., monitoring, alerting, metrics, logging, and troubleshooting. Work closely with senior engineers, architects, product owners End-to-end service ownership such as debugging complex technical issues involving multiple system & components. 
Minimum Qualifications
You must be enrolled in a full-time Bachelor's Program in Computer Science or Engineering or other relevant fields You must either be in your penultimate or final year of studies, and will be graduating in 2024 or 2025 Good understanding in OOP, and its implementation within relevant programming language such as Go, Java, C++, C#, Python, or others Familiar with web services, including REST Internship period: Jan – June 2024 
Preferred Qualifications
Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills Committed to quality, including security and performance Solid analysis and critical thinking Good understanding in system or software testing best practices, automated build, and test cases Ability to convey complex message in an understandable form (written/spoken) Good foundation in system/software performance metrics, especially in web application Experience in cloud-native application development Good understanding of cloud infrastructure, especially in AWS 
Learning Benefits

In this role, you will have the opportunity to learn and work on a cloud service. You will have the opportunity to build and run a cloud service that is secure, stable, and testable guided by experienced software engineers. We are utilizing multiple state-of-the-art tools which will expose you to the modern way of building a proper distributed system.

About Autodesk

With Autodesk software, you have the power to Make Anything. The future of making is here, bringing with it radical changes in the way things are designed, made, and used. It is disrupting every industry: architecture, engineering, construction, manufacturing, and media and entertainment. With the right knowledge and tools, this disruption is your opportunity.

Our software is used by everyone - from design professionals, engineers, and architects to digital artists, students, and hobbyists. We constantly explore new ways to integrate all dimensions of diversity across our employees, customers, partners, and communities. Our goal is to expand opportunities for anyone to imagine, design, and make a better world.

At Autodesk, we're building a diverse workplace and an inclusive culture to give more people the chance to imagine, design, and make a better world. Autodesk is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and considers all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristic. We also consider for employment all qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with applicable law.

Autodesk has always valued flexibility in how we work. We continue to provide employees flexibility to support their work preferences wherever possible and nearly all roles are hybrid or remote, unless otherwise indicated.

Are you an existing contractor or consultant with Autodesk? Please search for open jobs and apply internally (not on this external site). If you have any questions or require support, contact Autodesk Careers.

Salary is one part of Autodesk’s competitive package. Offers are based on the candidate’s experience and geographic location.

Your new company For our Client, the largest Private Banking and Asset Management group owned by an entrepreneurial family, we are looking for a Full Stack Developer.
Your new role As a Full Stack Developer, you are responsible for the successful development of our front workbench within the RM and Client platform strategy. Your specific duties include:
Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutionsBuild highly responsive web applications through appealing visual design using AngularDevelop and manage well-functioning databases and applications, following a microservices architectureWrite effective APIs, and build reusable components for future useTest software to ensure responsiveness and efficiencyTroubleshoot, debug and upgrade softwareImplement security guidelinesWrite technical documentation
You will be working in product oriented agile delivery teams with key stakeholders in APAC and EMEA. The international setup offers you to work remotely and in co-location spaces. Your line team is mainly located in Singapore.
 What you’ll need to succeedThis role requires a passion to code, test and deliver quality applications within the desired timeframes.Minimum 2-8 years proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role with focus on back-end developmentAn excerpt from our technology and tool landscape: Java, Angular, Kubernetes (OpenShift), Kafka, Jira, Gitlab, Springboot, Azure Dev Cloud,Familiarity with common stacks and agile methodologyGood understanding of Design Patterns used in Java and Microservices ArchitecturesFamiliarity with databases (e.g. Oracle, MySQL, MongoDB), web servers (e.g. Apache), container technology (kubernetes or OpenShift) and DevOps platforms (GitLab)Excellent communication and teamwork skillsGreat attention to detail, solution driven and analytical mindset personExperience in the Banking/Financial Industry would be an added advantage

The organization believes in achieving success together and entrusting you with great responsibility, offering an environment in which everybody can contribute and share expertise, help establish agile ways of working and bring in innovative ideas.

Job description:
LOCATIONSingapore
Responsibilities
Participate in the development of 2B software projects related to artificial intelligence technologies.Transform prototypes from the R&D team into commercial products.Contribute to product design, testing, documentation, and standardization related activities.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree or higher in computer science or a related field, with at least two years of relevant work experience.Proficiency in at least one backend programming language (Java and Python preferred), with the ability to quickly learn new languages and frameworks.Frontend development skills, with the ability to use at least one popular frontend development framework such as React, Vue, or Angular.Familiarity with popular development and deployment tools, such as Shell, MySQL, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.It is a plus to have development experience in a specific technical domain, such as distributed systems, heterogeneous computing, big data frameworks, machine learning frameworks, etc.

About Us
The ShopBack Group is Asia-Pacific’s leading shopping, rewards, and payments platform, serving over 40 million shoppers across ten markets.
Driven by the vision to become the world's most rewarding way to shop, ShopBack is dedicated to saving members money and time, while delivering delightful experiences with every purchase. The platform also enables merchants and brands to engage with their members in a cost-effective manner.
Founded in 2014, ShopBack now powers over US$3.7 billion in annual sales for over 15,000 online and in-store partners, with over half a million transactions happening via the platform daily. In 2022, ShopBack expanded its offerings into the realm of financial services with the launch of ShopBack Pay and PayLater - providing members with responsible and convenient payment options at checkout, while empowering partners with more ways to engage potential customers.
Responsibilities
Oversee solutions design and delivery, including integration with existing architecture.Coordinate and manage communications between product managers, engineering teams and internal business usersConduct design review of the application and provide guidance to the team on recommendations to help ensure the development of a successful applicationDevelop and maintain integrations between SFDC and 3rd party services (eg. APIs, Zendesk, Microsoft Dynamics NAV, etc)Design and build high-performance, reusable, and reliable Apex code with best practices.Migrating/Deploying codes and Salesforce components using out of the box and/or other deployment toolsLeverage on thorough understanding of business processes and system processes to make recommendations and propose technical/non-technical solutions to meet business requirementsIdentify the business use cases and transform them into logical technical components and design.Plan and execute internal unit testing and integration testing.Effectively maintain and contribute to the technical documentation of the Salesforce implementation.
Requirements
At least 3 years of experience as a Software Engineer or Salesforce Developer.Good understanding of Salesforce fundamental concepts (application, data, security & integration), CRM domain knowledge (Sales Cloud) and best practices.Strong module configuration and technical skills in Apex, Flows, etc.Strong technical foundation in integration components for SFDC, SFDC APIs (SOAP, REST, BULK APIs), Apex Triggers, Apex controllers, Apex Web Services, Apex callout, inbound & outbound messaging, Flows, etc.Strong knowledge of the Salesforce Declarative Process Automation features.Effectively debug system issues, identify the root cause and provide the required fixes.Experience in Salesforce Lightning UI and building Lightning Web components.Exposure to software version control and deployment tools like Github, Bitbucket, JenkinsExposure to VSCode, Salesforce DX, Tooling, Metadata APIs, Data LoaderAdmin/Developer Certifications in Salesforce is a plusKnowledge on React and Java is a plus

Job description:
Company Description
We are the world’s largest independent energy and commodities trading company. Every day we use our expertise and logistical networks to distribute energy around the world, efficiently and responsibly. From 40 offices worldwide, we seek to add value across the energy supply chain, including deploying our scale and market understanding to help facilitate the energy transition. To date, we have committed over $2.2 billion of capital to renewable projects, and are identifying and developing low-carbon opportunities around the world.
Our people are our business. Talent is precious to us and we create an environment in which individuals can reach their full potential, unhindered by hierarchy. Our team comprises more than 65 nationalities and we are committed to developing and sustaining a diverse work force. Learn more about us here.
Job Description
You will sit on our business desk and work closely with the team; you will create new analytical tools and support applications. You will identify users’ needs, translate them into new solutions and aim to tackle existing technological inefficiencies. The role will offer you an opportunity to impact the commercial decisions, and the business itself, far more than a traditional developer role. You will be involved in transforming the way analytics is developed and used across the firm.
The Role
Sit directly with the trading teams to build and support market-focused analytical toolsIndependent analysis of both business and user requirements, and translating them into seamless UI/UX experiencesImplementation of clean, well-documented, tested, and extensible code to satisfy those requirementsTurning user feedback into actionable design improvements and bug fixesSuggesting innovative and reliable technical solutions to the businessHelp upskill the desk regarding coding best-practices and ensure mission-critical scripts are adequately productionized 
Qualifications
Relevant university degree3+ years of experience in a similar role3 + years of enterprise level in Python Passion for UI/UX design, experience in designing front end applicationsFull Stack development experience using a TypeScript framework ideally React.js
Additional Requirements
Knowledge of Excel/VBA would be an advantageDatabase knowledge (Redis, Oracle, MongoDB) would be an advantage
Additional Information
Personal Characteristics
Results oriented and demonstrably commercialIncisive and accurate judgmentExcellent attention to detailOutstanding communication and relationship management skillsGlobal outlook. Able to work across organizational and cultural boundariesTeam player, with an open non-political style and a high level of personal integrityEnergetic, resilient and resourceful, with an ability to work accurately under pressureCreativity and problem solving
What We Offer
Large variety of projects, creative freedom and direct access to our user community Potential for travel to our London, Geneva and Houston offices
Skills: Front-End Development:Full-Stack Development:Python (Programming Language):React.js:Stack:Translation:TypeScript:User Experience (UX):User Interface Design:User Requirements

Job DescriptionWe are seeking a Mobile Engineer to join our team and help us build innovative mobile applications, advertising SDKs, and edge computing solutions for our clients. As a Mobile Engineer, you will work closely with our senior engineers and designers to develop and maintain high-quality mobile applications and advertising SDKs for both iOS and Android platforms, as well as explore edge computing solutions to optimize our clients' mobile experiences.  We welcome candidates without prior experience who are passionate about mobile development and willing to learn. Our senior engineers will provide guidance and mentorship to help you improve your skills and progress quickly. 

Responsibilities:Collaborate with senior engineers and designers to develop and maintain mobile applications and advertising SDKs for iOS and Android platforms.Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.Implement user interfaces and design specifications provided by our designers.Integrate third-party libraries and APIs into our applications and SDKs.Develop and maintain advertising SDKs for mobile applications.Work with ad networks and partners to ensure proper integration and functionality of the SDKs.Explore and develop edge computing solutions to optimize our clients' mobile experiences.Work with our QA team to ensure that applications and SDKs are fully tested and meet our quality standards.Perform code reviews and ensure code quality and consistency.Participate in team meetings and provide updates on project progress. 
Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience).Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Kotlin, Swift, Objective-C.Experience with mobile development frameworks and tools, such as Android Studio, Xcode, or React Native. Strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles.Familiarity with Git version control system.Good understanding of mobile app architecture patterns such as MVVM, MVP, or MVC.Ability to write clean, efficient, and maintainable code.Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.Strong communication and teamwork skills.Self-motivated and able to work independently with minimal supervision. 
Preferred qualifications:Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.Experience with RESTful APIs and JSON data formats.Understanding of basic SQL and database design.Familiarity with Firebase or other cloud-based backend services.Experience with unit testing and automated testing frameworks.Knowledge of ad networks and ad formats such as banner, interstitial, and rewarded video.Experience with ad mediation and ad exchange platforms such as AdMob and Good Ads.Understanding of ad targeting and user segmentation strategies.iOS and Android platform experience.Understanding of edge computing and its potential use cases for mobile applications.If you are passionate about mobile development and willing to learn, we encourage you to apply for this position. You will have the opportunity to work with experienced engineers who will provide guidance and mentorship to help you improve your skills and progress quickly. Additionally, you will have the chance to explore edge computing solutions and their potential applications to enhance our clients' mobile experiences.


Tips: If you do not receive the interview invitation from iQIYI within 7 days, we will not arrange you to participate in the follow-up interview. Thank you for your understanding, attention and recognition to iQIYI!

As a Senior Software Application Engineer, your primary responsibility will be actively participating in the development of equipment software. You'll collaborate closely with hardware, firmware, and software engineers to create cutting-edge virus diagnostic equipment software, from its inception to deployment.
Your tasks will encompass designing and developing various components, including Software GUI, Utility Tools, Application and system level programs. Throughout the software lifecycle, you will follow the Agile development methodology, ensuring a smooth and efficient development process.

What if the work you did every day could impact the lives of people you know? Or all of humanity?
At Illumina, we are expanding access to genomic technology to realize health equity for billions of people around the world. Our efforts enable life-changing discoveries that are transforming human health through the early detection and diagnosis of diseases and new treatment options for patients.
Working at Illumina means being part of something bigger than yourself. Every person, in every role, has the opportunity to make a difference. Surrounded by extraordinary people, inspiring leaders, and world changing projects, you will do more and become more than you ever thought possible.
Position Summary
A Software Engineer is a highly skilled software developer who is responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software applications. They work as part of a development team and are involved in every aspect of the software development life cycle, from concept to delivery.
Position Responsibilities
Work as part of Agile scrum teams to design, implement, and test world-class distributed cloud software that powers our industry-leading DNA sequencing and information systemsDevelop and maintain Java / C# based web application and microservicesShow a passion for leading-edge software development practicesDisplay a passion for clean code, loose coupling, and clean architecturesBe a result-oriented hyper-collaborator: leading joint design sessions, pair programming, design and code reviews, etc.Practice software engineering principles such as agile methodologies, scrum and continuous integration
Position Requirements
Full Stack Developers who are proficient in both frontend and backend codingDemonstrated strong ability to design, develop, and maintain object-oriented multi-threaded . C# or Java applicationsBuilding and consuming REST APIsExperience in Angular+ Typescript, JavascriptRDBMS such as AWS-RDS, PostgreSQL or MySQLMessage Queues (AWS-SQS, Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ or similar)Automated testing / unit testing concepts and toolsAble to write robust and performant code that meets product requirements while being lean, maintainable, unit tested, and easy to understandAn individual who strives not to excel in only specific programming language but to excel in software architecture and design.Excellent problem solving and troubleshooting skillsSelf-starter mentality with excellent communication skillsBe curious, detail oriented, and analytical, with a proven ability to learn quicklyBe team-oriented, motivated, taking ownership of assigned tasksGood verbal and written communication skillsPassion for technologyProficient with source control management repositories (GIT, SVN)Experience in CI/CDFamiliar with Agile methodologiesMust thrive in fast-paced, dynamic environment
All listed requirements are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.
Preferred Experience/Education/Skills
Experience in biotech and bioinformatics is a plusCollaborative experience in a multi-national scrum team is a plusBS or MS in Computer Science preferred1-3 years software development experience.Fresh graduates are also welcome.
Illumina believes that everyone has the ability to make an impact, and we are proud to be an equal opportunity employer committed to providing employment opportunity regardless of sex, race, creed, color, gender, religion, marital status, domestic partner status, age, national origin or ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, pregnancy, military or veteran status, citizenship status, and genetic information.

As a Senior Software Application Engineer, your primary responsibility will be actively participating in the development of equipment software. You'll collaborate closely with hardware, firmware, and software engineers to create cutting-edge virus diagnostic equipment software, from its inception to deployment.
Your tasks will encompass designing and developing various components, including Software GUI, Utility Tools, Application and system level programs. Throughout the software lifecycle, you will follow the Agile development methodology, ensuring a smooth and efficient development process.
Roles And Responsibilities
Design, implement, and test equipment software.Create software test and verification plans and protocols, conducting prototype and verification testing.Optimize existing user interface designs.Collaborate with Product Management and Marketing to improve the user experience.Monitor software-related issues and lead their resolution using a well-documented and methodical approach.
Qualifications: Preferred Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science or a related field.
Job Requirements/Special Skill Sets
Any Javascript experience for frontend.Proficient in C/C++ programming for backendExperience in GUI software design.Previous involvement in application development on an equipment system will be an advantage.
P.S Working location is in East of Singapore.

What if the work you did every day could impact the lives of people you know? Or all of humanity?
At Illumina, we are expanding access to genomic technology to realize health equity for billions of people around the world. Our efforts enable life-changing discoveries that are transforming human health through the early detection and diagnosis of diseases and new treatment options for patients.
Working at Illumina means being part of something bigger than yourself. Every person, in every role, has the opportunity to make a difference. Surrounded by extraordinary people, inspiring leaders, and world changing projects, you will do more and become more than you ever thought possible.
Position Summary
A Software Engineer is a highly skilled software developer who is responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software applications. They work as part of a development team and are involved in every aspect of the software development life cycle, from concept to delivery.
Position Responsibilities
Work as part of Agile scrum teams to design, implement, and test world-class distributed cloud software that powers our industry-leading DNA sequencing and information systemsDevelop and maintain Java / C# based web application and microservicesShow a passion for leading-edge software development practicesDisplay a passion for clean code, loose coupling, and clean architecturesBe a result-oriented hyper-collaborator: leading joint design sessions, pair programming, design and code reviews, etc.Practice software engineering principles such as agile methodologies, scrum and continuous integration
Position Requirements
Full Stack Developers who are proficient in both frontend and backend codingDemonstrated strong ability to design, develop, and maintain object-oriented multi-threaded . C# or Java applicationsBuilding and consuming REST APIsExperience in Angular+ Typescript, JavascriptRDBMS such as AWS-RDS, PostgreSQL or MySQLMessage Queues (AWS-SQS, Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ or similar)Automated testing / unit testing concepts and toolsAble to write robust and performant code that meets product requirements while being lean, maintainable, unit tested, and easy to understandAn individual who strives not to excel in only specific programming language but to excel in software architecture and design.Excellent problem solving and troubleshooting skillsSelf-starter mentality with excellent communication skillsBe curious, detail oriented, and analytical, with a proven ability to learn quicklyBe team-oriented, motivated, taking ownership of assigned tasksGood verbal and written communication skillsPassion for technologyProficient with source control management repositories (GIT, SVN)Experience in CI/CDFamiliar with Agile methodologiesMust thrive in fast-paced, dynamic environment
All listed requirements are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.
Preferred Experience/Education/Skills
Experience in biotech and bioinformatics is a plusCollaborative experience in a multi-national scrum team is a plusBS or MS in Computer Science preferred1-3 years software development experience.Fresh graduates are also welcome.
Illumina believes that everyone has the ability to make an impact, and we are proud to be an equal opportunity employer committed to providing employment opportunity regardless of sex, race, creed, color, gender, religion, marital status, domestic partner status, age, national origin or ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, pregnancy, military or veteran status, citizenship status, and genetic information.

Job description:
At Toku, we create bespoke cloud communications and customer engagement solutions to reimagine customer experiences for enterprises. We provide an end-to-end approach to help businesses overcome the complexity of digital transformation in APAC markets and enhance their CX with mission-critical cloud communication solutions. Toku combines local strategic consulting expertise, bespoke technology, regional in-country infrastructure, connectivity and global reach to serve the diverse needs of enterprises operating regionally.
Toku is currently getting into a scale-up mode. We want to continue creating momentum for our products in the APAC regions and helping customers with their communications needs. As we build the Operations department, we are looking for a System Engineer Intern who can help with the back-end system management and front-end inquiry. Want to be part of our journey?
What would you be doing?
You will report to our Network Administrator and be part of the Operations Team responsible for efficient day-to-day support and providing resolutions to technical issues across a wide scope of customers and tech environments.
Respond to phone calls and e-mail requests for a variety of technical support issues.Follow up with incidents and monitoring alerts related to system.Document, assign, track, and monitor tickets to ensure a timely resolution.Identify, research and resolve basic technical problems by guiding internal and external stakeholders through applications, troubleshooting issues, and performing testing as necessary to replicate issues.Proactively manage multiple trouble tickets and follow through to resolution.Provide all manners of support including installation, configuration and maintenance of system.Provide troubleshooting and de-bugging of system.Standby 24/7 as and when needed for operational / maintenance services, even during weekends and Public Holidays.
We would love to hear from you if you have / are:
A student pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/ Information Technology or relevant field.Able to commit full-time for 6 months.Possess basic knowledge in database application such as (not limited to) Oracle, MongoDB, and MySQL.Familiar with IT system (Linux & Windows) administration.Resourceful with a positive attitude and excellent interpersonal skills.Able to learn quickly in a fast-paced environment.Willing to accept unfamiliar tasks and projects as well as changes in work assignments and responsibilities.Experience with O365, WordPress, Jira, Confluence and/or HubSpot will be a plus.Proficiency in Mandarin both verbal and written will be an added advantage.
If you would love to experience working in a start-up growing at an accelerated speed, and you think you tick most of the requirements, join us!

Job description:
At Toku, we create bespoke cloud communications and customer engagement solutions to reimagine customer experiences for enterprises. We provide an end-to-end approach to help businesses overcome the complexity of digital transformation in APAC markets and enhance their CX with mission-critical cloud communication solutions. Toku combines local strategic consulting expertise, bespoke technology, regional in-country infrastructure, connectivity and global reach to serve the diverse needs of enterprises operating regionally.
Toku is currently getting into a scale-up mode. We want to continue creating momentum for our products in the APAC regions and helping customers with their communications needs. As we build the Operations department, we are looking for a System Engineer Intern who can help with the back-end system management and front-end inquiry. Want to be part of our journey?
What would you be doing?
You will report to our Network Administrator and be part of the Operations Team responsible for efficient day-to-day support and providing resolutions to technical issues across a wide scope of customers and tech environments.
Respond to phone calls and e-mail requests for a variety of technical support issues.Follow up with incidents and monitoring alerts related to system.Document, assign, track, and monitor tickets to ensure a timely resolution.Identify, research and resolve basic technical problems by guiding internal and external stakeholders through applications, troubleshooting issues, and performing testing as necessary to replicate issues.Proactively manage multiple trouble tickets and follow through to resolution.Provide all manners of support including installation, configuration and maintenance of system.Provide troubleshooting and de-bugging of system.Standby 24/7 as and when needed for operational / maintenance services, even during weekends and Public Holidays.
We would love to hear from you if you have / are:
A student pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/ Information Technology or relevant field.Able to commit full-time for 6 months.Possess basic knowledge in database application such as (not limited to) Oracle, MongoDB, and MySQL.Familiar with IT system (Linux & Windows) administration.Resourceful with a positive attitude and excellent interpersonal skills.Able to learn quickly in a fast-paced environment.Willing to accept unfamiliar tasks and projects as well as changes in work assignments and responsibilities.Experience with O365, WordPress, Jira, Confluence and/or HubSpot will be a plus.Proficiency in Mandarin both verbal and written will be an added advantage.
If you would love to experience working in a start-up growing at an accelerated speed, and you think you tick most of the requirements, join us!
Skills: Attitude Change:Computer Science:Jira:Linux:Mandarin:MongoDB:MySQL:Office 365:SQL:Systems Engineering

Job description:
Company Description
Syngenta is an R&D global leader in agriculture; dedicated to bringing plant potential to life. Each of our 28,000 employees in more than ninety countries works together to solve one of humanity’s most pressing challenges: growing more food with fewer resources. A diverse workforce and an inclusive work environment are enablers of our ambition to be the most collaborative and trusted team in agriculture.
Our employees reflect the diversity of our customers, the markets where we operate and the communities which we serve. No matter what your position, you will have a vital role in safely feeding the world and taking care of our planet. Join us and help shape the future of agriculture.
Job Description
During the internship, you will be part of the team that works on smart manufacturing and digital transformation-related projects. You will get the opportunity to build the knowledge base alongside the subject matter experts on topics such as robotics, automation, IoT and so on.
Role & Responsibility
Support the regional operational technology team by developing, testing, and maintenance of systems using JavaScript, C#, and HTML.You will be working on projects such as functional enhancements on the Warehouse Management System (WMS), and feature improvements on the Augmented Reality (AR) application.Assist the team in troubleshooting and resolving issues and bugs.Provide technical support to end-users by troubleshooting issues and providing appropriate solutions.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and implement system improvements and optimizations.Document system configurations, procedures, and troubleshooting steps for future reference.
Qualifications
Undergraduate in Computer Science, Information Technology or equivalent.Knowledge in C#, JavaScript, and HTML programming languages.Proficient level with Microsoft Office (Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint).Able to commit to a 5 - 6 months full-time internship starting September 2023
Skills Preferred
Self-initiative, resourcefulness, as well as good organizational, communication and people skills.Good problem-solving and analytical skills with attention to detail.Organization and time management skills.Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment.Familiarity with development frameworks such as ASP.NET, Vue.js and Node.js is a plusBasic understanding of database concepts and SQL.Most importantly, passion for learning and a desire to gain practical experience in a professional setting.
Additional Information
Syngenta is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate in recruitment, hiring, training, promotion, or any other employment practices for reasons of race, colour, religion, gender, national origin, age, sexual orientation, marital or veteran status, disability, or any other legally protected status.

Job description:
Job Title: Software Engineer (C/C++ & Python) Job Location: Singapore Roles and responsabilities:  We are seeking an exceptional Software Engineer to join our Simulator team. This position is responsible for supporting and developing new features in our financial simulator that can run back tests for different financial asset classes at varying frequencies: daily, intraday, and tick-by-tick. The Simulator is written in C++ and Python on Linux and is used by both researchers to develop alphas and portfolio managers to build strategies. Our team works closely with end users to design and develop new features that continuously improve the existing product, and to build tools to upgrade their research onto newer versions of the platform.
What You’ll Bring:
Computer Science or closely related degree5+ years of experience as a software engineerDemonstrated ability to program in C/C++ and Python in a Linux environmentUnderstanding of proper software testing techniquesCandidates need prior experience in finance with a strong experience in high-frequency tradingDevOps and scripting experience is a plusExcellent problem solving abilities with strong attention to detailsMature, thoughtful, with ability to operate in a collaborative, team-oriented cultureMotivated by the transformational effects of technology-at-scaleExcellent communication skills in both verbal and written form, good command of the English language  About us:
Taleo is a Global Management and Delivery Group, as well as a Recruitment Agency in APAC, specializing in Financial Services.With offices in Luxembourg, Paris, Brussels, Antwerp, Amsterdam, Barcelona, Lisbon, Geneva, Zurich, and Singapore, Taleo Group provides to its clients the combination of a unique blend of industry expertise, top level consultants, best-in-class transformation skills and a unique working culture. Our goal is to improve our Client efficiency in governance, management and execution. We provide support and expertise to our clients, relaying on the most important resource of all, man and brainpower capital.Our Specialization and Expertise in our Client industry makes us the ideal Partner :When it comes to Operations and Projects, our Consultants offer strategic guidance, analytical prowess, roadmap for success, technical expertise, and exemplary execution and delivery. However, we also recognize that effective business and executive management require a different skill set and are usually meant to be long-term committed. That's where our expertise in Recruitment comes into play.This allows us to formulate a complete offer covering our Clients’ resource challenges and needs.There are 6 pillars to our activities and interventions:- Agile Governance & Project Management,- Processes & Change Management,- BaU & Operations,- Finance, Risk, Regulatory & Compliance,- Digital Transformation & Data Management- Analytics & Innovation

Bake Engineering
Our engineering team is the backbone of everything you see at the company. We pride ourselves on writing good code. We care about good engineering practices, working with great people, and working on real and impactful products.
We practice test-driven development, and are more than happy to allow team members the opportunity to solve problems with unconventional or cutting-edge methods. If you care about continually improving your craft, and want to work with like-minded peers, this is the place for you!
Job Description
We are seeking a talented Full Stack Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a Full Stack Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining JavaScript-based applications
What You'll Do
Design, develop, and maintain JavaScript-based applications, with a strong focus on front-end development.Implement, update, and maintain back-end components as needed.Follow best coding practices and clean code principles when developing.Embrace test-driven development (TDD) and create unit tests for your work.Collaborate actively with the team throughout the development process.Be open to learning and adapting to new technology stacks when required.Develop scalable and fault-tolerant software solutions based on user requirements.Maintain and improve existing codebases.Identify areas for codebase improvements and implement enhancements.Participate in technical design discussions and peer review code changes.Create clear and comprehensive documentation for new applications.Collaborate cross-functionally with product managers, UX designers, marketing professionals, and other developers to achieve optimal solutions.Assist customers or departments with technical issues, including software system design and maintenance.
Requirements
At least one year of experience building medium to large scale software applications.Strong grasp of JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Proficiency with React Native and TypeScript is a strong plus.Strong knowledge of SQL and databases.Experience with unit and integration testing.Understanding of asynchronous programming and related quirks and workarounds.Solid grasp of fundamental design principles behind scalable applications.Proficient in using code versioning tools, particularly Git.Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work on complex technical challenges.Excellent communication skills and a willingness to actively engage with team members.
We value knowledge, skills and teamwork over paper qualifications. If you are a passionate Full Stack Engineer who enjoys working on cutting-edge projects and thrives in a collaborative work environment, we encourage you to apply.
We want to transform and decentralise finance with tomorrow’s technology. This is where you come in. Join a company that is at the forefront of bleeding-edge innovations in blockchain and DeFi. You will be empowered to push boundaries and think out of the box. You will get to work with a bunch of ridiculously motivated and talented people. And most importantly, you'll have fun. The best places to work at, are often also the most fun to work at. That's us.
We hire based on merit, fit, and strong alignment to our culture. Our culture is defined by 7 team principles: Integrity, Resourcefulness, Ownership, Meritocratic Decision-making, Customer Obsession, Radical Candour, and Passion. These 7 principles guide our company, our people, and our work. At Cake Group, our culture is our pride. It has been instrumental to our success, so we are steadfast in our commitment to it. We welcome you to add to it.

Job description:
About Us
The Dyson software team are responsible for all aspects of the product development lifecycle. Our teams support Research & NPI with bringing their new ideas to like as well as the delivery of all the Embedded software inside the products, the Dyson Link Mobile Apps (iOS, Android & WeChat) as well as the Cloud systems which support our analytics, machine learning and data science teams.
Dyson is growing into new product categories and we are looking to build out a new team to support our ambitions. This team will look at building products based using the Android platform. Over time the team will grow in the UK, and Singapore. We all come from a variety of educational backgrounds and experience levels; not all of us are computer science graduates. We believe that teams composed of people from diverse backgrounds are more successful and innovative.
About The Role
You will become the domain expert for UI, Amination & Creative development for Android based product user interfaces.Working with ecosystem partners such as App developers, hardware manufactures, Algorithm providers along with major App & Internet Service companies to craft revolutionary new Dyson products.Collaborate with colleagues from other disciplines, including test engineers, product owners, Scrum Masters, UX/UI designers and software engineers from both internal & external teams.Clarification and refinement of user stories and non-functional requirements with the wider Team 
About you

An experienced Android developer focused on UI with Experience in Modern Android DevelopmentHands on experience with Kotlin, Java, Jetpack Libraries, Compose, Canvas, Lottie and other UI tools.Experienced in creative coding, generative art, animation, and UI development techniquesComfortable working on concepts alone as well as a part of a larger development teamIt’s essential you’re a self-starter and able to drive early concepts through to production when neededExcellent verbal and written communication skills and confident presenting your work and representing the team at all levels.You’ll be able to build consensus with stakeholders to ensure we deliver what our customers and the wider business needs.Clear focus and drive for quality & perfection – you’ll be able to find and maintain focus and priority in a rapidly evolving environment.Curious, inventive and creative - be prepared to solve tough problems and look beyond convention.Effective communicator - concise and timely communication, managing facts and emotion 
Benefits

Dyson Singapore monitors the market to ensure competitive salaries and bonuses. Beyond that, you’ll enjoy a transport allowance and comprehensive medical care and insurance. But financial benefits are just the start of a Dyson career. Professional growth, leadership development and new opportunities abound, driven by regular reviews and dynamic workshops. And with a vibrant culture, the latest devices and a relaxed dress code reflecting our engineering spirit, it’s an exciting team environment geared to fuelling and realising ambition.
Dyson is an equal opportunity employer. We know that great minds don’t think alike, and it takes all kinds of minds to make our technology so unique. We welcome applications from all backgrounds and employment decisions are made without regard to race, colour, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other any other dimension of diversity.

3 years of experience as a Front-End DeveloperProficiency in modern front-end technologies and frameworksStrong understanding of responsive web design and cross-platform compatibilityFamiliarity with UI/UX design principles and collaboration with design teamsAbility to work collaboratively with back-end developers to integrate front-end and back-end functionalitiesExperience in building communication or community platforms is a significant plus

Company Name: SCIENTIFIC INFRA AND PRIVATE ASSETS PTE. LTD.
Job description:
About EDHECinfra
EDHECinfra is a provider of market indices, benchmarks and valuation analytics for investors in unlisted infrastructure equity and private debt. EDHECinfra maintains the infraMetrics® platform: an online information system that gives access to key market indices including the infra300® and infra100® series. InfraMetrics® also includes a wealth of valuation data and analytics, risk metrics, a fund strategy analysis tool providing robust performance quartiles for any segment, strategy or vintage, and peer group analyses allowing investors to compare themselves against comparable segments of the market.
Role
We are looking for a senior front-end/ UI developer to build and maintain our web app, infraMetrics®, using React.js. As the lead developer, you will be responsible for the technical direction of the UI and take ownership of user requirements. You will also be responsible for the aesthetics and usability of the UI. The end product should be robust, visually appealing and intuitive.
Responsibilities
 Understand business requirements, translate them into Wireframes and implement them Gather feedback from stakeholders and iterate on the UI design Provide technical leadership for the UI Provide assistance to users
Requirements
 10+ years of experience of professional coding Experience with managing a team Degree in computer science or engineering preferred Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles Experience with state management (preferably React Context) Experience with Javascript (preferably Typescript) Good with visualization of numerical data using charts and tables Working knowledge of CSS and CSS preprocessor Willing to understand the business context and the big picture
To apply for this offer, please send a CV and a cover letter to: recruitment@edhec-dbd.com.
To know more about EDHECinfra: https://edhec.infrastructure.institute/mission

The end product should be robust, visually appealing and intuitive.

 Understand business requirements, translate them into Wireframes and implement them Gather feedback from stakeholders and iterate on the UI design Provide technical leadership for the UI Provide assistance to users

 10+ years of experience of professional coding Experience with managing a team Degree in computer science or engineering preferred Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles Experience with state management (preferably React Context) Experience with Javascript (preferably Typescript) Good with visualization of numerical data using charts and tables Working knowledge of CSS and CSS preprocessor Willing to understand the business context and the big picture

Job description:
Airwallex is the leading financial technology platform for modern businesses growing beyond borders. With one of the world’s most powerful payments and banking infrastructure, our technology empowers businesses of all sizes to accept payments, move money globally, and simplify their financial operations, all in one single platform.
Established in 2015, our purpose is to connect entrepreneurs, business builders, makers and creators with opportunities in every corner of the world. Today, Airwallex has a global footprint across Asia-Pacific, Europe, and North America.
Your work
Where to start? We have multiple products spanning b2b wallets, payment acceptance, credit card issuing, treasury management, FX and this list continues to expand. At Airwallex, we are growing rapidly and our engineers are encouraged to be nimble and have an appetite to want to work across multiple product verticals.
We have ambitious goals, cutting edge technology and multiple opportunities to come in and start delivering simple and effective engineering led solutions to our customers. Our tech stack (Kotlin, Kafka, Kubernetes and React) is built to be flexible, architecturally designed to be scalable and event driven at its core.
Day to day you will collaborate with your team mates on full stack development (including testing). Our release cycle is rapid and devops is also a fully integrated working practice. In addition you will have the opportunity to make a contribution to how we think about how we work. Our leaders welcome all Airwallex people to contribute to our IT road map and to constantly challenge the processes that help us build world class software.
Who You Are
You are committed – You strive to produce, exceptional, risk free, fully tested solutions in all the platforms you build.You can think on your feet - with experience building platforms which resolve fast paced, ever changing success measures.You are team player– you enjoy working in a collaborative, innovative and customer first driven environmentYou are naturally curious– always asking why to better understand our customer needsYou are a passionate problem solver – You love digging deep and brainstorming with colleagues in order to come up with the best solution for a problem 
What You'll Bring
Experience using Java, Kotlin, Spring / Spring BootDesigning and building REST APIsFamiliar in a form of messaging system (ideally apache Kafka)Distributed data storage systems (Cassandra, Hazelcast, Oracle Coherence or similar)AWS (EC2, RDS, ELB, CloudFront, etc), Aliyun (similar stack) with docker and Kubernetes
At Airwallex you’ll have the ability to make an impact in a rapidly growing, global fintech. We want you to share in our success, which is why you’ll be offered a competitive salary plus valuable equity within Airwallex. We also like to ensure we create the best environment for our people by providing a collaborative open office space with a fully stocked kitchen. We organise regular team building events and we give our people the freedom to be creative.
Airwallex is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and anyone seeking employment at Airwallex is considered based on merit, qualifications, competence and talent. We don’t regard colour, religion, race, national origin, sexual orientation, ancestry, citizenship, sex, marital or family status, disability, gender, or any other legally protected status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.
Airwallex does not accept unsolicited resumes from search firms/recruiters. Airwallex will not pay any fees to search firms/recruiters if a candidate is submitted by a search firm/recruiter unless an agreement has been entered into with respect to specific open position(s). Search firms/recruiters submitting resumes to Airwallex on an unsolicited basis shall be deemed to accept this condition, regardless of any other provision to the contrary.

Being the modern web developer of today (be it programmer, web master, application
developer, solution developer, or full stack developer), you will make the difference by making

The Persona We Seek

Motivated and eager, people friendly, evolve with technology, dare to be different, expect changes, expect challenges, meet targets, fulfil your dreams, ability to deliver, care and support for customers.
IMPORTANT: Happy and friendly with customers! They are the reasons we exist.
The Believe And Practise Of Good Work Ethics
Reliability/dependability, dedication, productivity, cooperation, character, integrity, sense of responsibility, emphasis on quality, discipline, teamwork, professionalism, respectfulness, determination, accountability, humility, passion, communication skills, being goal oriented, organizational skills, creativity, and being adaptable and flexible.

 Good conversation, writing and documentation skills, Versatility and adaptability to software technology, development and maintenance, Keen to learn and level up in tech stack

 Degree / Diploma / ITE / Self-conferred title in IT, Software & Web Development, Entry level (up to 3 years experience) Experienced level (3 years or more)
Office Accessibility
 Comfortable office environment, 5-10 minutes stroll from Tai Seng MRT station, Bus (Service No. 8, 22, 24, 28, 43, 58, 70, 76, 80, 158, 641, 90, 93, 151), Near by good food centres and coffee shops Free gym and swimming pool

Job description:
Staff Backend Software Engineer
"To be the most loved everyday food and groceries destination!" - that’s our mission at foodpanda (small ‘f’).foodpanda is the largest food and grocery delivery platform in Asia, outside of China. Operating in more than 400 cities across 11 markets, we continue to expand and grow in our core food delivery business, as well as in new verticals like grocery deliveries, with a strong tech infrastructure at our core. From our restaurants-partners, cloud kitchens and cloud grocery stores — foodpanda is just one tap away, getting everything you need into your hands quickly and conveniently!
We are looking for enthusiastic problem solvers to join us in scaling our platform, to digitalise businesses in Asia, uplift rider livelihoods and build a hyper-convenient platform for our customers. If you love working with technology to create solutions and are not afraid to roll up your sleeves to get things done, you will find your tribe here at foodpanda. Our diverse and high-performing team comprises people from more than 60 nationalities, and we welcome all experiences, backgrounds, and perspectives.
What's On The Menu
 A diver, to the deepest parts of complex software systems to make it simpler.  Have the mind of an architect, to model hundreds of subsystems mentally before bringing them to life.  A leader, to involve in complex systems and build with high quality, reliability and security.  A learner, to learn continuously and knows there are no upper limits in terms of self-improvement.  An owner, who can take ownership closer to heart and deliver under tight schedules.  A fantastic team player, who can work with technical and product team members with the highest degree of collaboration.  A champion of best practices and scalable solutions which affect multiple teams. 
What You Can Bring To The Table
 You are self-sufficient by owning complex deliverables and driving it from architecture, system design, and all the way to serve millions of users.  You have good written and verbal communication skills to express solutions to large/ complex problems.  You care about the quality of your deliverables in terms of resiliency, performance and scalability.  You have a good eye for relational database performance bottlenecks and know how to circumvent them in every walk of the solution.  You are versatile about the programming languages or the kind of problems you can solve.  Experience running & maintaining a (micro-)service environment with decoupled services under high load with large data sets.  Familiar with cloud provider GCP, AWS and with DevOps practices 
What We Offer
A dynamic and challenging work environment.A company committed to developing you personally and professionally.A great working atmosphere with regular company and team events.A vibrant and international team committed to diversity and inclusion.Responsibility from day one in a fast growing and global company.Other benefits include free food, health and dental insurance, and learning and development opportunities!
Our parent company, Delivery Hero, is a global leader in the food delivery industry processing over 3 million orders every day and operating in 40+ markets in the world, with 18,000 employees and approximately 500,000+ restaurant partners.

The Defence Science and Technology Agency (DSTA) brings you to the forefront of cybersecurity, digital transformation and engineering. From working on software development and systems integration to unmanned technologies and artificial intelligence, you can have an impact on Singapore’s defence.
Achieve your fullest potential with opportunities to build your technical expertise and hone your competencies in diverse domains. You can also expect an immersive learning experience, where you will work with bright minds and collaborate with global industry experts.
DSTA is recognised as one of the top 10 employers in the Engineering & IT sector, where our engineers and IT professionals work alongside procurement specialists to deliver state-of-the-art capabilities for Singapore’s peace and security.
Internship opportunities and a meaningful career await you.
Learn more about DSTA at https://www.dsta.gov.sg .
 Opportunity 
Imagine developing the brain, heart and soul of complex systems that serve as the nerve centre to plan and monitor mission executions. If this sounds exciting to you and you are passionate about technology, we welcome you to join us on this journey!
At DSTA’s Command, Control and Communications Development (C3D) Programme Centre, we develop software systems that enable decision makers in the SAF and government agencies to execute missions successfully. We are looking for a Backend Developer with strong technical competencies and problem-solving skills to join us.
 What can the team offer you? 
Our Team: You will join a multi-disciplinary team of developers, architects and product managers who are passionate about creating meaningful and impactful software systems. It’s a place where you can solve diverse, complex challenges, alongside thoughtful, intelligent individuals who lead with curiosity, empathy, and optimism.
Career Opportunities: We work on different projects, ranging from experimentations to operational system development in different domains spanning across Air, Land, Sea and Whole-of-Government systems. You will also have the flexibility and whitespace to work on exciting side projects and hone your skillsets in different technical areas like artificial intelligence, modelling and simulation, cybersecurity and internet of things (IoT). At times, you will have the chance to share at brown bag sessions and townhalls, as well as collaborate with worldwide leading research institutes and industry commercial partners.
Professional Development: There are numerous opportunities to grow and excel professionally in your career with us. From your first day with us, your onboarding experience includes mentorship, buddy system and technical courses to build your competencies and connect with colleagues on a personal level. On top of that, we work with DSTA’s in-house Academy to curate courses taught by both industry professionals as well as in-house lecturers.
Culture: We encourage our community to bring their whole selves to work, respect the need for work-life balance and allow for autonomy in the software development process and your career.
 Once here you will 
Collaborate closely with product managers, developers and stakeholders to deliver valuable and impactful software that combat evolving threats.Work in a multidisciplinary software development team to define technical requirements and architecture, scope tasks, and develop software applications geared towards scale, robustness and performance.Design and develop robust backend services based on our Technology Stack.Perform automated build and tests in our DevSecOps pipeline.Adopt continuous delivery practices to improve software delivery performance.Exchange technical knowledge and experiences with like-minded developers.
Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related fields.Candidates with more than 2 years of relevant working experience may be considered for a Senior Software Developer position.
Relevant Experience And Mindset
Good knowledge in one or more programming languages, such as Java, C++, Python.Familiarity with networking protocols (e.g. TCP/IP, UDP etc.), messaging protocols (e.g. MQTT etc.) and developing REST APIs.Familiarity with database storage technologies such as RDBMS and No-SQL.Good understanding of data structures, design patterns, algorithms and software design.Have a passion for software development and technology.Thrive in a team-oriented, project-based work environment.Excellent analytical and communication skills including the ability to deliver technical concepts clearly across different audiences.Have a passion for innovation and learning new software architectures, frameworks, languages and technologies.
 It would be a bonus if you have 
Experience in Agile (e.g. Scrum or Extreme Programming) practices and software development lifecycle.Working experience with cloud computing providers (e.g. Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure etc.).Knowledge of microservices development and containerisation technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Docker etc.).Knowledge of DevSecOps practices, and use of continuous integration and continuous delivery tools.Knowledge of role-based access control, authentication and authorization.Experience with Linux OS.Knowledge of secure coding and cybersecurity.
 Application Instructions 
If this sounds like the right environment for you to grow and thrive, then we are looking forward to getting to know you!
To apply, please submit your resume and cover letter.
As DSTA is an agency under Ministry of Defence, only Singapore Citizens will be considered.
Skills: Algorithms:Artificial Intelligence (AI):Communication:Data Structures:Delivery Performance:Design Patterns:Java:Software Design:Software Development:Technical Requirements
